title: Nenjinilae Nenjinilae Lyrics Uyire
stanzas:
Nenjinilae nenjinilae
oonjalae naanangal
en kannilae.

Nenjinilae nenjinilae
oonjalae naanangal
en kannilae.
sivandhathae en manjalae
kalyaana kalyaana
kanavu ennullae (2)

oarap paarvai veesuvaan
uyirin kayiril avizhumae(2)
sevvidhazh varudum podhu
dhega thangam urugumae

ulagin oasai adangumpodhu
uyirin oasai thodangumae.
vaanilaa naanumae
mugil izhuthu kanmoodumae.

Nenjinilae nenjinilae
oonjalae naanangal
en kannilae.
sivandhathae en manjalae
kalyaana kalyaana
kanavu ennullae (2)

kungumam yaen soodinen
koala muththathil kalaiyathaan.
koorai pattu yaen uduthinen
oodal pozhuthil kasangathaan.

mangai koondhal
malargal edharkku
kattil melae nasungathaan.
deepangal anaippathe
pudhiya porul naam
thaedaththaan.

Nenjinilae nenjinilae
oonjalae naanangal
en kannilae.
sivandhathae en manjalae
kalyaana kalyaana
kanavu ennullae (2)
